name: Elemental Rush (Matthew Holt)
description:
This game is a "boss-rush" style game developed for the CGX Grad Jam.

Players will fight against 2 bosses with different elemental hazards on the stage, each boss will have an elemental weakness that can be exploited for higher damage.

Players can swap between 4 differing elements to fight against the bosses they'll face.

More bosses may be added in coming weeks, schedule permitting.
